languages.text: {n}Иокаста рявкает приказ в вокс, отвечающий ей лающим эхо выстрелов. Наконец она удовлетворенно кивает.{/n} "Толпа усмирена, Лорд-капитан. Демонстрация нашей решимости и пара показательных казней остудили их пыл".

{n}She barks orders into the vox and is answered immediately by a staccato of gunfire. After a while, she nods in satisfaction.{/n} "The crowd has been pacified, Lord Captain. A clear demonstration of our resolve and a few public executions have tempered their fervour."
languages.original_text: {n}Иокаста рявкает приказ в вокс, отвечающий ей лающим эхо выстрелов. Наконец она удовлетворенно кивает.{/n} "Толпа усмирена, Лорд-капитан. Демонстрация нашей решимости и пара показательных казней остудили их пыл".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jocasta barks orders into the vox, which answers with a staccato of gunfire. At last, she nods in satisfaction.{/n} "The crowd has been pacified, Lord Captain. A demonstration of our resolve and a few public executions have tempered their fervour."

{n}Jocasta barks orders into the vox, which answers with a staccato of gunfire. At last, she nods in satisfaction.{/n} "The crowd has been pacified, Lord Captain. A demonstration of our resolve and a few public executions have tempered their fervour."

{n}Jocasta barks orders into the vox and is answered immediately by a staccato of gunfire. At last, she nods in satisfaction.{/n} "The crowd has been pacified, Lord Captain. A clear demonstration of our resolve and a few public executions have tempered their fervour."

{n}Jocasta barks orders into the vox and is answered immediately by a staccato of gunfire. At last, she nods in satisfaction.{/n} "The crowd has been pacified, Lord Captain. A clear demonstration of our resolve and a few public executions have tempered their fervour."

{n}She barks orders into the vox and is answered immediately by a staccato of gunfire. After a while, she nods in satisfaction.{/n} "The crowd has been pacified, Lord Captain. A clear demonstration of our resolve and a few public executions have tempered their fervour."

{n}She barks orders into the vox and is answered immediately by a staccato of gunfire. After a while, she nods in satisfaction.{/n} "The crowd has been pacified, Lord Captain. A clear demonstration of our resolve and a few public executions have tempered their fervour."

languages.text: {n}Da órdenes por el voco y recibe como réplica una ráfaga de disparos. Al cabo de un tiempo, asiente satisfecha.{/n} «El gentío ha sido pacificado, Lord Capitán. La demostración de nuestra determinación y una serie de ejecuciones públicas ha templado sus ánimos».
languages.original_text: {n}She barks orders into the vox and is answered immediately by a staccato of gunfire. After a while, she nods in satisfaction.{/n} "The crowd has been pacified, Lord Captain. A clear demonstration of our resolve and a few public executions have tempered their fervour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Da órdenes por el voco y recibe como réplica una ráfaga de disparos. Al cabo de un tiempo, asiente satisfecha.{/n} «El gentío ha sido pacificado, Lord Capitán. La demostración de nuestra determinación y una serie de ejecuciones públicas ha templado sus ánimos».

languages.text: {n}彼女はヴォクスに向かって大声で命令すると、断続的な銃声がすぐに返ってきた。しばらくして、彼女は満足げにうなずく。{/n}「民衆は鎮まりました、ロード・キャプテン。我々の決意をハッキリと行動で示し、何度か公開処刑を行ったところ、民衆の熱は収まったのです」
languages.original_text: {n}She barks orders into the vox and is answered immediately by a staccato of gunfire. After a while, she nods in satisfaction.{/n} "The crowd has been pacified, Lord Captain. A clear demonstration of our resolve and a few public executions have tempered their fervour."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女はヴォクスに向かって大声で命令すると、断続的な銃声がすぐに返ってきた。しばらくして、彼女は満足げにうなずく。{/n}「民衆は鎮まりました、ロード・キャプテン。我々の決意をハッキリと行動で示し、何度か公開処刑を行ったところ、民衆の熱は収まったのです」

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克朝通讯器发出了命令，随后通讯器里立刻传来了断断续续的枪声。过了一会儿，她满意地点了点头。{/n}“那些暴乱分子已经安静下来了，舰长大人。我们明确地展示了我们的决心，还公开处决了几个人，那些人的狂热就被熄灭了。”
languages.original_text: {n}She barks orders into the vox and is answered immediately by a staccato of gunfire. After a while, she nods in satisfaction.{/n} "The crowd has been pacified, Lord Captain. A clear demonstration of our resolve and a few public executions have tempered their fervour."

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克朝通讯器发出了命令，随后通讯器里立刻传来了断断续续的枪声。过了一会儿，她满意地点了点头。{/n}“那些暴乱分子已经安静下来了，舰长大人。我们明确地展示了我们的决心，还公开处决了几个人，那些人的狂热就被熄灭了。”

languages.text: {n}Sie plärrt Befehle in das Vox-System. Als Antwort ertönt augenblicklich ein Stakkato von Schüssen. Nach einer Weile nickt sie zufrieden.{/n} "Die Menge wurde befriedet, Lord Captain. Eine klare Demonstration unserer Entschlossenheit und einige öffentliche Hinrichtungen haben ihren Eifer gebremst."
languages.original_text: {n}She barks orders into the vox and is answered immediately by a staccato of gunfire. After a while, she nods in satisfaction.{/n} "The crowd has been pacified, Lord Captain. A clear demonstration of our resolve and a few public executions have tempered their fervour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie plärrt Befehle in das Vox-System. Als Antwort ertönt augenblicklich ein Stakkato von Schüssen. Nach einer Weile nickt sie zufrieden.{/n} "Die Menge wurde befriedet, Lord Captain. Eine klare Demonstration unserer Entschlossenheit und einige öffentliche Hinrichtungen haben ihren Eifer gebremst."

languages.text: {n}Elle aboie des ordres dans le vox. En réponse ne lui parvient qu'un staccato de coups de feu. Après un court instant, elle hoche la tête, l'air satisfait.{/n} « La foule a été pacifiée, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Cette démonstration sans équivoque de notre résolution et quelques exécutions publiques ont permis de tempérer leurs ardeurs. »
languages.original_text: {n}She barks orders into the vox and is answered immediately by a staccato of gunfire. After a while, she nods in satisfaction.{/n} "The crowd has been pacified, Lord Captain. A clear demonstration of our resolve and a few public executions have tempered their fervour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle aboie des ordres dans le vox. En réponse ne lui parvient qu'un staccato de coups de feu. Après un court instant, elle hoche la tête, l'air satisfait.{/n} « La foule a été pacifiée, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Cette démonstration sans équivoque de notre résolution et quelques exécutions publiques ont permis de tempérer leurs ardeurs. »

languages.text: {n}Silahtar, voksa bağırarak emir veriyor ve karşılık olarak anında kesik silah atışı sesleri geliyor. Bir süre sonra tatmin olmuş bir şekilde başını eğiyor.{/n} "Kalabalık etkisiz hâle getirildi Lord Kaptan. Kararlılığımızı net bir şekilde sergiledik. Halka açık infazlar sayesinde hararetleri azaldı."
languages.original_text: {n}She barks orders into the vox and is answered immediately by a staccato of gunfire. After a while, she nods in satisfaction.{/n} "The crowd has been pacified, Lord Captain. A clear demonstration of our resolve and a few public executions have tempered their fervour."
